title: Asian stocks, US treasuries fall on tariff angst
summary: Asian markets opened lower Tuesday. President Donald Trump's tariff threats regarding Greenland have reignited trade tensions. This has impacted investor confidence. European shares fell significantly on Monday. US markets were closed. Investors are watching for the European Union's response to potential US tariffs. The situation adds to existing market nervousness.

title: IndiGo posts biggest single-day gain in 16 months
summary: IndiGo's parent company, InterGlobe Aviation, saw its shares rise significantly. This surge followed a penalty from the Directorate General of Civil Aviation for flight cancellations. Investors reacted positively as the fine was less than anticipated. The company had faced disruptions in December due to crew time limits and aircraft issues.

title: Wipro sinks over 8% as weak Q4 guidance spooks investors
summary: Wipro shares plummeted over 8% on Monday following a disappointing fourth-quarter growth outlook provided by the IT services firm. The company reported revenue of ₹23,556 crore for the quarter ended December 31, with modest sequential and year-on-year increases. Analysts expressed concern over the management's guidance, leading to a significant drop in the stock price.

title: RIL slumps over 3% after Q3 miss dampens growth outlook
summary: Reliance Industries shares saw a significant drop on Monday. This decline followed the company's third-quarter results. Analysts point to slower growth across its business segments. Investors are advised to observe further developments. The stock has experienced a notable fall in the past month. Technical indicators suggest continued weakness. A cautious approach is recommended for retail investors.

title: Sun Pharma places non-binding offer for US-based Organon in its boldest global bet ever
summary: Sun Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd has submitted a non-binding offer to acquire US-based Organon for an all-cash deal, securing $10-14 billion in acquisition financing. This move marks Sun Pharma's boldest global bet, aiming to bolster its presence in women's health biopharma and biosimilars. The acquisition, if successful, would be the largest by an Indian pharmaceutical company.

title: Stock Radar: SBI hits fresh record high in January 2026; time to buy or book profits?
summary: State Bank of India stock has surged to fresh highs after retesting a breakout zone in January 2026. Experts suggest buying opportunities on dips, with potential to reach Rs 1,100. The stock shows strong upward momentum, trading above key moving averages and exhibiting a bullish trend.

title: Banks feel the pinch as CASA pool shrinks
summary: As Indian banks grapple with dwindling low-cost CASA deposits, a growing number of savers are shifting their money into market-driven investments seeking higher returns. This shift compels banks to depend increasingly on pricier short-term borrowing methods, such as Certificates of Deposit, to sustain their lending activities.

title: Tiger Global saga: An interpretation of maladies that's open to more ills
summary: Tiger Global may file a review petition following a Supreme Court verdict on the India-Mauritius tax treaty. The ruling alters how investors interpret tax treaties, particularly regarding indirect transfers. This development sparks discussions in tax and legal circles. The verdict's interpretation of a key treaty article differs significantly from investor expectations.

title: RBI tightens PSL norms, mandates auditor certification for lenders
summary: The Reserve Bank of India has strengthened priority sector lending compliance, mandating external auditor certificates from intermediaries to prevent double-claiming of loans. This move follows scrutiny of banks for misclassifying agricultural loans. The RBI aims to ensure credit flows to priority sectors by enhancing monitoring and internal controls.

title: World Economic Forum 2026: At Davos, Swiggy bets big on AI to revamp food delivery landscape
summary: With AI, several other things are happening on an experimental basis, according to Swiggy Food Marketplace CEO Rohit Kapoor, who said “it's important at this juncture to sort of embrace it”.

title: GSK to acquire US-based biopharma company RAPT Therapeutics via a $2.2 billion deal — Details here
summary: British biopharma major GSK to acquire US-based biopharma company RAPT Therapeutics via a $2.2 billion deal. Here's what investors need to know about the update, which is expected to close by first quarter of 2026.&nbsp;

title: MFs' Favourite: 13 smallcap stocks surge up to 170% in FY26 so far, 5 turn multibaggers
summary: Mutual funds ramp up stakes in 13 smallcap stocks that have surged up to 170% in FY26, with five turning multibaggers.

title: Top Gainers & Losers on Jan 20: Newgen Software, OLA, Tejas Networks, CDSL, Vodafone Idea, Havells among top losers
summary: Indian stocks experienced significant losses on January 20, with the Nifty 50 down 1.4% to 25,225 and the S&amp;P BSE Sensex falling 1.43%. Global trade tensions and mixed earnings contributed to the declines, alongside persistent foreign selling and geopolitical tensions impacting market sentiment.

title: Amagi Media Labs IPO listing in focus: What does GMP signal ahead of stock market debut?
summary: Amagi Media Labs IPO GMP is +16.5 ahead of listing on Wednesday. The estimated listing price of Amagi Media Labs IPO is likely to be  ₹377.5, which is 4.57% higher than the IPO price of  ₹361 per share.

title: Budget 2026 playbook: Capex stocks or consumption themes — Where should portfolios lean?
summary: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman will unveil the government's fiscal roadmap for the next year on February 1 this year. According to Axis Securities, one of the key challenges for the Union Budget 2026 would be to balance capex-led growth with consumption support.

title: Walmart-backed payments giant PhonePe receives Sebi nod for IPO: Report
summary: Walmart-backed payments giant PhonePe has received approval for its stock market listing from the capital market regulator, Sebi, after the company confidentially filed for an initial public offering in September 2025.&nbsp;

title: Armour Security IPO allotment date likely today. GMP, steps to check share allotment status online for SME IPO
summary: Armour Security IPO allotment date is likely today, 20 January 2026. Investors can check Armour Security IPO allotment status through the websites of NSE and IPO registrar. Skyline Financial Services is the Armour Security IPO registrar.

title: RAPT Therapeutics stock surges 63% in pre-market trade on Nasdaq after GSK's $2.2 billion acquisition deal
summary: RAPT Therapeutics' stock jumped more than 63% during the pre-market trading session on the US stock market after GSK Plc announced its $2.2 billion equity value acquisition deal. Here's what investors need to know about the stock and the acquisition update.

title: Are IPO listings still worth the risk for small investors?
summary: Given the unpredictable nature of IPO listings, financial advisers say individual investors are best off holding stocks via mutual funds or via the secondary market for the long run. Those who want to play the IPO listing game should be wary of these risks

title: Over 700 stocks hit 52-week lows on the BSE as Sensex suffers the biggest single-day fall in over 8 months
summary: The Indian stock market faced a drastic downturn as the Sensex dropped 1066 points, marking its largest single-day decline in over eight months. As many as 713 stocks hit their 52-week lows on the BSE. ITC and Trent were the two Sensex stocks that hit their 52-week lows.

title: NSDL declares board meeting date to announce Q3 results 2026. Details here
summary: NSDL's board of directors fixed the quarterly board meeting to be held on this day in January 2026. The company will approve and release the October-December quarter results for FY2025-26 on the same day. Here's what you need to know ahead of Q3 results.

title: Rupee falls 7 paise to settle at record low of 90.97 against US dollar
summary: At the interbank foreign exchange, the rupee opened at 90.91 and lost ground, touched an intraday low of 91.06, and finally ended the day at an all-time low of 90.97 (provisional) against the American currency.

title: Can the silver rally continue to mask Hindustan Zinc’s production problem?
summary: Q3 performance was mainly buoyed by the unprecedented rally in silver prices, but the near-full utilization of its capacity means HZL will find it hard to raise production quickly, leaving the stock vulnerable to fluctuations in metal prices.

summary: After  ₹22.2 crore fine, IndiGo assures DGCA of no flight cancellations from February 10.

title: Why the order of your investment returns matters more than you think.
summary: This critical factor often overlooked by investors can dramatically alter long-term wealth, even with consistent average returns.

title: Nomura sued by Adani-linked fund accused in short-seller report
summary: The Elara-owned Oyster Bay Fund borrowed from Nomura to make leveraged bets on Adani Enterprises and Adani Ports. Those positions collapsed after Hindenburg Research’s January 2023 report accused the Adani Group of “brazen stock manipulation” and suggested Elara-linked funds were involved, according to High Court filings.

title: Gainers & Losers: Hindustan Zinc, Ola Electric among 6 stocks that moved most on Tuesday

summary: The company’s shares have been receiving a severe beating from Dalal Street investors since June, crashing 61% from their recent highs, reaching the current level of  ₹65.85 apiece.

title: Silver prices rise by  ₹1 lakh in a month on dual demand boost — Is  ₹3.5 lakh the next big target?
summary: Silver prices continue to soar, reaching a record high of  ₹3,20,938, driven by industrial demand and geopolitical tensions. Analysts predict further increases, with potential targets of  ₹3,50,000, as investors diversify from riskier assets amid rising trade-related concerns.

title: Infra spending to be in focus in Budget 2026; expect an 8-10% earnings growth for Q3: Mirae Asset's Senior Fund Manager
summary: Varun Goel, Senior Fund Manager at Mirae Asset, anticipates a sustained emphasis on infrastructure spending in Budget 2026, with an expected 8-10% earnings growth for Q3.&nbsp;

title: AU Small Finance Bank Q3 Results: Profit jumps 26% to  ₹668 crore; NII rises 16%
summary: AU Small Finance Bank Q3 Results: The lender's profit stood at  ₹667.65 crore during the quarter under review as against  ₹528.44 crore in the year-ago period. The growth was led by a healthy 15.7% YoY increase in the company's net interest income (NII) to  ₹2,341.26 crore.

title: Can I use the sale amount of land to buy a shop and get an exemption under Section 54F?
summary: Exemption under section 54F is available only if the sale proceeds from the sale of the long-term capital asset are reinvested in a residential property.

title: Bessent says Powell attending Supreme Court arguments on Lisa Cook is a mistake
summary: CNBC reported that Powell plans to be present for oral arguments in a case that challenges Trump's power to remove governor Lisa Cook.
